Tests that console can filter messages by source.


Running: dumpLevels
All levels
{
    error : true
    info : true
    verbose : true
    warning : true
}
Default levels
{
    error : true
    info : true
    verbose : false
    warning : true
}

Running: beforeFilter
beforeFilter
Level menu: Default levels
